name: insemination
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of putting male sperm into a woman or female animal, either by sexual activity or an artificial method: Lisa became pregnant through donor insemination. the insemination of the cow See
inseminateSee also
artificial insemination
More examplesFewer examplesIntrauterine insemination was performed using semen collected from two different rams.We decided to try hormone injections to get things to precise levels to give natural insemination a better chance. Rafiki became the first elephant to have surgically assisted insemination.
